scripts.first-time: npm run i && npm run start:local
scripts.start:prod-pm2: npm run i && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start --name fth src/main.js -i max --node-args='--max-old-space-size=32000' -f
scripts.start:local-pm2: pm2 start src/config/pm2.config.js --env local && pm2 monit
scripts.push: npm run format && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.pull: git pull origin main && npm run i && npm run start:default
scripts.clean: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -r -f node_modules && rm -r -f backups && npm cache clean -f && npm run i && npm run start:default
scripts.clean:prod: rm -r -f node_modules && npm cache clean -f && npm run i
scripts.update: rm -r -f backups/* && cp package.json backups/package.json.backup && cp package-lock.json backups/package-lock.json.backup 2>/dev/null; true && mv node_modules backups/node_modules.backup 2>/dev/null; true && npm i -D npm-check-updates -f && ncu -u && npm run clean
scripts.restore: cp backups/package.json.backup package.json && cp backups/package-lock.json.backup package-lock.json && mv backups/node_modules.backup node_modules && npm run start:default
